Diebuster is the mecha where the[spoiler] main character is a machine that looks and thinks like a human until she becomes aware of it then stops the aliens by stopping a event horizonless black hole from destroying the universe after she saves her from from using the earth as a projectile[/spoiler] right?  If that's the one then it was on toonami.
